parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "model": "gen4_turbo",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.video_concepts[0].visual }}, {{ $json.video_concepts[0].audio }}, cinematic camera movement, precise motion control, reality distortion maximum, 8K resolution, alien technology effects",
  "image": "{{ $json.input_assets.images[0] || $json.input_assets.glass_transforms[0] }}",
  "duration": {{ $json.video_concepts[0].duration }},
  "resolution": "1080p",
  "enhance_prompt": true,
  "camera_control": "precise",
  "reality_distortion": "maximum",
  "motion_strength": 0.8,
  "seed": {{ Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) }},
  "watermark": false,
  "interpolate": true,
  "upscale": true
}

{
  "text": "{{ $json.video_concepts[0].audio }}",
  "model_id": "eleven_multilingual_v2",
  "voice_settings": {
    "stability": 0.5,
    "similarity_boost": 0.8,
    "style": 0.2,
    "use_speaker_boost": true
  },
  "pronunciation_dictionary_locators": [],
  "seed": {{ Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) }},
  "previous_text": "",
  "next_text": "",
  "previous_request_ids": [],
  "next_request_ids": [],
  "output_format": "mp3_44100_128",
  "apply_text_normalization": "auto",
  "language_code": "de",
  "add_generation_prompt_in_history": false,
  "enable_logging": true,
  "optimize_streaming_latency": 3,
  "voice_guidance": 1.5,
  "loudness": -24,
  "binaural": true,
  "frequencies": [432, 528, 741, 963, 40],
  "asmr_mode": true,
  "spatial_audio": "5D_surround"
}

{
  "video_url": "{{ $json.runway_video_url }}",
  "audio_url": "{{ $json.elevenlabs_audio_url }}",
  "emotion": "enthusiastic",
  "lip_sync": true,
  "asmr_mode": true,
  "emotion_intensity": 0.8,
  "voice_morphing": true,
  "personality_sync": true,
  "alien_tech_enhancement": true,
  "crystal_lion_mode": true,
  "galaxy_conquest_optimization": true
}

parameters.name: message

parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "video_url": "{{ $json.video_assets.runway_video }}",
  "multi_clips": true,
  "auto_subtitles": true,
  "reframe_mode": "AI_REFRAME_2",
  "aspect_ratio": "9:16",
  "clip_duration": [15, 30, 60, 90],
  "hook_optimization": true,
  "viral_patterns": [
    "baby_shark_repetition",
    "despacito_emotion",
    "gangnam_style_humor"
  ],
  "captions": {
    "style": "galaxy_conquest",
    "font": "bold",
    "color": "#FFD700",
    "background": "crystal_glass",
    "animation": "quantum_glow"
  },
  "thumbnail_optimization": true,
  "engagement_hooks": [
    "Crystal-L√∂we zeigt dir...",
    "Traumauto ab 99‚Ç¨?",
    "Galaxy-Eroberung startet JETZT!"
  ]
}

{
  "video_url": "{{ $json.enhanced_video_url }}",
  "content_type": "social_media_post",
  "platforms": ["instagram", "tiktok", "youtube", "facebook"],
  "auto_post": true,
  "aspect_ratio": "9:16",
  "3d_depth": true,
  "enhanced_avatars": true,
  "voiceovers": {
    "enabled": true,
    "voice_id": "crystal_lion_voice",
    "emotion": "galaxy_conquest"
  },
  "hashtags": {
    "auto_generate": true,
    "viral_optimization": true,
    "trending_analysis": true,
    "galaxy_conquest_tags": [
      "#CrystalLion",
      "#GalaxyConquest",
      "#TraumautoAb99Euro",
      "#LRLifestyle",
      "#PassivesEinkommen",
      "#Freiheit",
      "#AlienTech",
      "#VSMR432Hz"
    ]
  },
  "captions": {
    "auto_generate": true,
    "viral_hooks": true,
    "call_to_action": "Galaxy-Eroberung starten!",
    "urgency_triggers": true
  },
  "scheduling": {
    "optimal_timing": true,
    "multi_platform_sync": true,
    "galaxy_conquest_schedule": true
  }
}

{
  "values": [
    [
      "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}",
      "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[0].variant_id }}",
      "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[0].hook }}",
      "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[0].expected_viral_score }}",
      "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[0].galaxy_conquest_multiplier }}",
      "GALAXY_CONQUEST_ANALYTICS",
      "{{ $json.billion_view_target }}",
      "YEAR_3025_ALIEN_TECH",
      "CRYSTAL_LION_POWER_MAXIMUM",
      "UNIVERSAL_DOMINATION_ACTIVE"
    ]
  ]
}

{
  "post_urls": [
    "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[0].video_url }}",
    "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[1].video_url }}",
    "{{ $json.ab_test_matrix[2].video_url }}"
  ],
  "platforms": ["instagram", "tiktok", "youtube", "facebook", "twitter"],
  "metrics": [
    "views",
    "likes",
    "shares",
    "comments",
    "engagement_rate",
    "reach",
    "impressions",
    "click_through_rate",
    "conversion_rate",
    "viral_coefficient"
  ],
  "time_range": "24h",
  "galaxy_conquest_tracking": true,
  "alien_tech_metrics": {
    "consciousness_expansion_rate": true,
    "crystal_lion_power_level": true,
    "holographic_engagement": true,
    "quantum_viral_velocity": true,
    "universal_domination_progress": true
  },
  "competitor_analysis": {
    "enabled": true,
    "benchmark_against": "top_viral_content",
    "galaxy_conquest_comparison": true
  },
  "real_time_monitoring": true,
  "billion_view_tracking": true
}
